aboutMe.span1: Hi, I'm Aleksander Demyanovych, Full Stack Developer from near Trier, Germany. My focus is on the development of modern web applications in the field of business applications. I use JavaScript / Angular in the frontend and Python / Django in the backend to bring the projects to life. The resulting practical experience is reflected in the efficiency and scalability of the projects.
aboutMe.span2: I have the ability to analyze technical challenges and develop creative solutions. I not only want to contribute my skills to your company, but also actively work on making your projects more efficient. My goal is to create real added value through customized approaches and thus increase the success of your products.

contact.h2: Want to discuss a new project?
contact.h3: Then let's discuss your ideas and make it happen.

projects.spanDescription: Explore a selection of my work - please feel free to try them out.

description.videoflix: A versatile video platform that allows you to watch content in various quality levels. Whether you're discovering new videos or enjoying your favorite ones â€“ all within a user-friendly environment.
description.daBubble: Chat-Messanger-App inspired by Slack and Discord. Keep in contact with your colleagues and organize the next steps in your company.
description.join: Task Manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
description.sharkie: Play a little jump and run by helping little shark named Sharkie on his adventure.
